metadata.title: Manage your self-hosted Docker registries | Dokistry
metadata.description: Monitor and manage self-hosted Docker registries, images, and users from a single modern interface.

hero.title: Monitor Docker registries
hero.description: A single modern interface to monitor and manage your self-hosted Docker registries, images, and users.

features.title: Everything You Need
features.subtitle: Comprehensive Docker registry management in one clean interface

registryManagement.title: Registry Management
registryManagement.description: Monitor and manage self-hosted Docker registries with an intuitive interface. Connect multiple registries seamlessly.

imageInspection.title: Image Inspection
imageInspection.description: View detailed information about images and tag sizes. Monitor disk usage across your registries.

tagInspection.title: Tag Inspection
tagInspection.description: Inspect and analyze tags on each registry. Get comprehensive metadata at a glance.

tagsDeletion.title: Tags Deletion
tagsDeletion.description: Delete tags directly from the interface. Clean up unused resources efficiently.

multiRegistry.title: Multi-Registry
multiRegistry.description: Manage multiple registries from one instance. Switch between registries effortlessly.

userManagement.title: User Management
userManagement.description: Add and manage users with admin privileges. Control access to your registries securely.

cta.title: Get Started Today
cta.description: Join the community and start managing your Docker registries more efficiently. It's free, open source, and ready to deploy.
cta.footer: Built for developers, by developers • MIT Licensed

footer.copyright: © {year} Dokistry. Open source under MIT License.
